name: Classic_Espresso_48-inch_Bookshelf
reviews: The bookcase looks beautiful in my living room.
description: The Classic Espresso Collection features a combination of design, function and elegance, styled to coordinate with a variety of room decor. This attractive single-sided bookcase fits flush against walls and has four display shelves each approximately 11.5 inches deep. Three of the shelves are adjustable, one is fixed. The handsome espresso veneer, rounded edges and durable construction makes this unit ideal for library, classroom or common areas. Adult assembly required. 25 inches wide x 12 inches deep x 46 inches high Four display shelvesSingle-sidedThree of the shelves are adjustableSet includes: Classic Espresso 48 inches BookshelfMaterials: MDFFinish: EspressoUpholstery color: Weight: 44 poundsSeat dimensions: Dimensions: 48x25x12Furniture Room: Nursery, Living Room, BedroomProduct Features: Includes HardwareMaterial: MDFStyle: TraditionalAssembly: Assembly RequiredStorage Type: Bookcases and ShelvesExact Color: EspressoFinish: PaintedColor: BrownStyleTraditionalMaterialMDFFinishPaintedAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownProduct FeaturesIncludes HardwareStorage TypeBookcases and Shelves
